text: The jni\native\BUILDING file in the tomcat-native-1.1.27-win32-src.zip package contains UNIX build instructions. Since this package is specific to Windows, this file should contain Windows build instructions.
creator: snickels@ipswitch.com
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
In general, Windows building instructions need an update
a) in native/BUILDING file
b) on the site
http://tomcat.apache.org/native-doc/#Building


As of now, latest build instructions from Mladen are here:
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=56363#c10
